TopicTitle: Show off your KSP Blender Renders!

Articles.Content:
Let's see your KSP Blender renders!

Recently, user [Dasoccerguy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/142055-Dasoccerguy) figured out a way to get KSP models into Blender, allowing you to make fully customizable renders of your KSP creations. For example, here is my stock Saturn V replica (link in my signature):

[![kNdo2s7h.png](http://i.imgur.com/kNdo2s7h.png)](http://imgur.com/kNdo2s7)

Zekes has also made some cool renders of his full-size stock Space Shuttle. This utility opens up a lot of cool possibilities for presenting KSP craft, so I wanted to create this thread to allow people to show off their KSP Blender renders.

More details on how to do this here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111483-KSPBlender-Blender-addon-for-importing-craft-files](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111483-KSPBlender-Blender-addon-for-importing-craft-files)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-23T15:00:00Z" title="02/23/2015 03:00  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 23, 2015</time> by GusTurbo**

Oh! Oh! Me first! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

My computer slaved for eight hours over this image. 3000 x 4000 pixels and 3000 samples per pixel.

I have no idea what it'll look like in this post. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Here's the actual link: [http://i.imgur.com/AYi2emW.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/AYi2emW.jpg)

![AYi2emW.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/AYi2emW.jpg)
Wow, 8 hours! I only did 100 samples for mine because I didn't want to wait all day. I feel like you get diminishing returns after a certain point.
Yes. Somewhere between 1500 and 3000 samples is where it becomes very small... Though it looks cool as hell.
Those are some super samples...

This is awfully fun.

[![jL2WunLh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/jL2WunLh.jpg)](http://imgur.com/jL2WunL)
Does this only work with stock parts?

> 
> Does this only work with stock parts?

So far, yes, unfortunately.

He's working on it, though. (I might lend a hand...)

> 
> This is awfully fun.
> http://imgur.com/jL2WunL[http://i.imgur.com/jL2WunLh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/jL2WunLh.jpg)

DOOOOOD! that's so many kinds of awesome! I'm a major noob when it comes to this kind of editing. Do you think you could do something like this for one of my Constellation craft come KSP version 1.0? 

 I would be indebted to you eternally and would reciprocate in any way I could. 

MJ

> 
> DOOOOOD! that's so many kinds of awesome! I'm a major noob when it comes to this kind of editing. Do you think you could do something like this for one of my Constellation craft come KSP version 1.0? 
>  I would be indebted to you eternally and would reciprocate in any way I could. 
> 
> MJ

I think I could help you out. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> So far, yes, unfortunately.
> He's working on it, though. (I might lend a hand...)

will it be working only with specific mods, or will there be a way to use any mod?

Theoretically, using a for loop and going through each file in GameData, then generating the list off of that, would work.

Theoretically. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

![I5dhq53.png](http://i.imgur.com/I5dhq53.png)

That's great!

Thanks! I need to fix the horizon line to break it up more. Maybe toss in some more eye candy like a hangar out there some where? Oh, fire and smoke... I forgot about that completely ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

I'd suggest a back-left perspective, with the horizon about 3/5ths of the way up the image... but that's just me! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Do whatever you want, it's looking great.
